body_html: @yaroslavvb Do you think, though, that there would be a hard-cap limit for number of images trained using this transfer learning approach? Eventually I would like to build my own CNN (or train Inception from scratch) but I'll likely have to wait for the new GTX1080 to be able to do that with any speed

body: @yaroslavvb Do you think, though, that there would be a hard-cap limit for number of images trained using this transfer learning approach? Eventually I would like to build my own CNN (or train Inception from scratch) but I'll likely have to wait for the new GTX1080 to be able to do that with any speed
